member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.CreateTimecardRequest
member.summary: This object can be used to create a timecard.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.CreateTimecardRequest.RequestGuid
member.summary: A GUID that identifies this request object from other request objects in the same HTTP request

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.CreateTimecardRequest.Timecard
member.summary: The Timecard object containing the data used to create the timecard resource.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.CreateTimecardResponse
member.summary: This object is the response equivalent of the CreateTiemcardRequest. It contains the information about the result of the request.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.CreateTimecardResponse.Request
member.summary: The Request associated with the response

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.CreateTimecardResponse.TimecardId
member.summary: The id of the timecard resources that was created by the request, or if the timecard already existed, the id of the existing timecard resource.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.CreateTimecardResponse.ResourceLocation
member.summary: A URL to the location of the newly created resource. Equivalent to the value in Location header in a single Create Timecard HTTP request.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.CreateTimecardResponse.IsSuccess
member.summary: True if the timecard was created as expected. False if not.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.CreateTimecardResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: An HTTP Status Code that indiciates the status of the result of the request. When the status is 409 - Conflict - this indicates a timecard already exists for the attributes specified in the request. In this instance, the client can use the TimecardId attribute of this response to issue an PUT timecards/{id} request

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.CreateTimecardResponse.StatusMessage
member.summary: A message that accompanies the status code

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.OvertimeQueryCriteria
member.summary: OvertimeQueryCriteria is the request object to be used with the qapi/overtime api. Most overtime is calculated for a date range of a week in length, but any date range may be supplied.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.OvertimeQueryCriteria.PersonId
member.summary: The Id of the Person for whom to calculate overtime. Required

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.OvertimeQueryCriteria.StartDate
member.summary: The start of the date range for which to calculate overtime. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.OvertimeQueryCriteria.EndDate
member.summary: The end of the date range for which to calculate overtime. Required

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.OvertimeQueryCriteria.PayCycleId
member.summary: The Id of the pay cycle for which to calculate overtime. Required. Overtime can only be calculated on a per-paycycle basis.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.OvertimeQueryCriteria.ClientQueryId
member.summary: A Guid set by the client which can be used to uniquely tie the overtime calculation result back to the query.

member.summary: The end date of the pay period this Comment is associated to. Required if the comment is assigned to a PositionId + PayCycleId + PayPeriodEndDate grouping. Not Required if the comment is assigned to a TimecardId or timecardStatusId

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.TimeManagementConfiguration
member.summary: The time management configuration contains the settings necessary to determine if supervisors have the ability to edit time for a timecard. Additionally, contains whether or not comp time has been enabled with time entry in self service.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.TimeManagementConfiguration.AllowSupervisorToEditTime
member.summary: Indicates if supervisors are allowed to modify employee time entries for timecards. This is a site level parameter.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.TimeManagementConfiguration.TimeHistoryPriorYears
member.summary: Indicates the number of prior years for which employee wants to see their time history in self-service. This is a site level parameter.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.TimeManagementConfiguration.CompTimeEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether or not an employee can select CompTime Taken earnings type in the Additional Time dropdown list in the SS time entry page. This is a site level parameter.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.TimeManagementConfiguration.WorkSchedulesEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether or not work schedules are enabled in Self Service. This is a site level parameter

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.TimeManagementConfiguration.MaxPayPeriodCompTimeTaken
member.summary: Indicates the amount of Comp Time that a person may take per pay period. This is a site level parameter.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.TimeManagementConfiguration.EnableSalaryEmployees
member.summary: Indicates the whether or not Salary Employees are visible in Self Service. This is a site level parameter.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.TimeManagementConfiguration.EnableExempt
member.summary: Indicates whether Exempt employees are to be included in Self-Service. This is a site level parameter

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.TimeManagementConfiguration.AllowLeaveRequestsOnTimecards
member.summary: Indicates whether leave requests are enabled to drop-in on timecards

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.TimeManagementConfiguration.TimeManagementPriorMonthsLookback
member.summary: The number of months to look back for time approval (as of 07/20/2020) purposes 0 - this month only null - no lookback limit

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.TimeManagementConfiguration.DisplayNameHierarchy
member.summary: Person Display Name Hierarchy

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.ValidateCompTimeCriteria
member.summary: Criteria used to validate whether or not the employee can take comp time.

member.summary: Pay cycle Id for the CompTimeAccrual

member.summary: Start date for the AccrualDetail

member.summary: Daily comptime thresholds

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.ValidateCompTimeCriteria.WeeklyCompTimeThresholds
member.summary: Daily comptime thresholds

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.ValidateCompTimeResponse
member.summary: Validation for a comp time request

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.ValidateCompTimeResponse.CompTimeIsValid
member.summary: Boolean stating whether or not the request was valid

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.ValidateCompTimeResponse.CompTimeValidationMessage
member.summary: Message for why the comp time is not valid

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.ValidationError
member.summary: List of all the validations performed for today for experience clock-in/out. Current Error Codes are: 1. E01 - No active clock positions found for the employee for today. 2. E02 - No wage records found for the active clock positions for the employee. 3. E03 - No prepared pay-periods found for any of the active clock positions for today. 4. E04 - Total hours worked in a single day cannot exceed 24 hours. 5. E05 - Time entered cannot overlap across detail and clock positions.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.TimeManagement.ValidationError.ErrorCode
member.summary: Error Code

member.summary: Error Description
